doc:
Raoul Trujillo https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Raoul_Trujillo 0 Raoul Maximiano Trujillo de Chauvelon (born May 8, 1955) is an American actor, dancer, and choreographer. A former soloist with the Nikolais Dance Theatre, he is the original choreographer and co-director for the American Indian Dance Theatre. He is the host for a series of dancing programs. Trujillo's career spans more than 30 years in film, television, and theatre. He is best known for playing Zero Wolf, the Mayan villain in Apocalypto (2006), directed by Mel Gibson, and for playing the Iroquois chief Kiotseaton in the film Black Robe. He has appeared in numerous other films, including The New World, Cowboys and Aliens, Riddick, Blood Father, Sicario, and its sequel Sicario: Day of the Soldado . Raoul_Maximiano_Trujillo de Chauvelon ( born May_8_,_1955 ) is an_American_actor , dancer , and choreographer . A_former_soloist with the_Nikolais_Dance_Theatre , he is the_original_choreographer_and_co-director for the_American_Indian_Dance_Theatre . He is the_host for a_series of dancing_programs . Trujillo 's_career spans more_than_30_years in film_,_television , and theatre . He is_best_known for playing Zero_Wolf , the_Mayan_villain in Apocalypto_(_2006_) , directed by Mel_Gibson , and for playing the_Iroquois_chief_Kiotseaton in the_film_Black_Robe . He has_appeared in numerous_other_films , including The_New_World , Cowboys_and_Aliens , Riddick , Blood_Father , Sicario , and its_sequel_Sicario : Day of the_Soldado .
